title: HOUSE UNIT FOR RENT : NORTH VALLEY STREAM
posting_body: ['Private Unit for rent on North Valley stream.', 'Maximum two Occupancy.', 'Not pet friendly.', 'Located on North Valley stream NY.', '2 bed room.', 'Living & dinning together separate.', 'Kitchen & one bathroom.', 'Gas stove.', 'Utilities included.', 'No laundry on site .', 'If a year commitment made.', 'Owners will provide free wifi access.', 'FIOS service provider.', 'Street parking only .', 'NO drive way access .', 'This location is close to Walmart, target located on green acres mall.', 'Just 2.2 miles away.', 'Walgreens & CVS only 1.2 miles .', '14 restaurants all walking distance.', 'Opposite to “Key Food store” accepted payment type Bank Cashier check only from local Bank .', 'No direct cash or personal check accepted for the first 6 month or a year lease .', 'One month deposit required with first month rent “None Refundable” .', 'If you don’t like it for some reason.', 'There is no refund .', 'You have to let the manager know 4 weeks in advance.', 'It’s very nice town and amazing neighborhood.', 'Contact David or AHM or Vickey at : 516-200-4665 or 205-937-6375 .', 'Please send sms msg for the first time .']
